CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 30, 1954, pg. 1, reads: "Fire Victim - Mrs. Mildred Caviness was also among those forced to move from the 1500 block of North Murtland last Saturday with friends on the North Side, following a disastrous fire which destroyed the homes of seven families living in brick and frame row. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mildred Caviness wearing plaid suit, posed in interior with lace tapestry on wall, after losing her Homewood row house to fire on North Murtland Street
